Areas in the reduced conifer dataset for class (6 areas total):
A = South America = blue
D = Indonesia + Africa / Asia / PNG = Cyan (light blue)
F = Fiji & surrounding = green
G = Australia = yellow
H = New Caledonia = red
I = New Zealand = Pink

Areas in the full conifer dataset, in Klaus & Matzke 2020, Systematic Biology (9 areas total)
A = South America = red
B = Africa = orange
C = Asia = light green
D = Indonesia region = green
E = PNG = dark green
F = Fiji & surrounding = light blue
G = Australia = dark blue
H = New Caledonia = purple
I = New Zealand = yellow
